explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning algorithms for predicting tax delinquencies.

explanations.long short-term memory: LSTM is another deep learning model applied in the study for sequence data processing.

explanations.sequence-to-sequence learning: The seq2seq model is mentioned as one of the approaches used in the study.
